Name: Antenna
About the game: A machine ponders its loneliness. It scans the radio spectrum for an answer to its question. Antenna currently supports US keyboard input only. Other keyboard layouts will work but results may be unpredictable. Mouse wheel required. Puzzles are Audio Based, Please ensure you have sound on.
